item.title: Reply to 'IAmA guy who went Laser Questing today. AMA' on /r/casualiama at https://reddit.com/r/casualiama/comments/uild0/iama_guy_who_went_laser_questing_today_ama/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'IAmA guy who went Laser Questing today. AMA' on /r/casualiama at https://reddit.com/r/casualiama/comments/uild0/iama_guy_who_went_laser_questing_today_ama/:

Whenever we go play at the laser tag nearby, there’s always a bunch of kids on the opposing team and they zerg swarm us making it hard to win. Is it the same where you are?
